reviewText: I have used these in my PreK and Kinder classes for years and love them!!  Each animal/insect segment is about 10 minutes....just right for our little attention spans.  I would love to have them on DVD and would love it if Sony would produce more videos of different animals.

This is a great video for young children. I show the ladybug section to my preschoolers when we learn about ladybugs. It is very age-appropriate, educational, and keeps the children's attention. The photography is well-done. Each insect section is around 10 minutes long, which is perfect for little ones.

I purchased this video for my three year old.  She loved it!  Excitedly she said, "Mommy look at the Lady Bug.  Look at the Spider."  It kept her mesmerized.  My husband watched along with us.  I have to tell you, I learned a few things about insects myself.
Both my 5 year old and 3 year old loved this movie! It presents science in an entertaining, yet not annoyingly so, way.
